channel.description: Recent content in Windows on Yadullah Duman

item.title: How to setup WSL with Windows Terminal, ZSH and powerlevel10k
item.description: I wanted to share with you my recent WSL2 setup on my new workstation which was ridiculously easy to do! What I wanted Link to heading Basically I wanted the same setup that I would run on my MacBook and my Linux machines: A configurable terminal similar to iTerm2 or Tilix ZSH shell with oh-my-zsh Powerlevel10k theme Docker and VS Code support What you can expect Link to heading In the following, I will guide you step by step on how I did my setup.
